Detailed Description

Todo Today Sheet

include "litesql.hpp"

Todo Today Sheet Class is automatically generated by litesql from the xml file: pomotuxdatabase.xml. It represents the list of all the tasks that the user desire to accomplish during the day. note: Every Activity linked to the Todo Today Sheet has to be already related to an Anctivity Inventory Sheet

See also:
pomotuxdatabase.hpp

Activity &  rCurrentActivity,
TodoTodaySheet &  rTTS 
) [virtual]

Ends the Activity whose reference is passed by setting its attribute mIsFinished to true and deleting it from the Todo Today Sheet

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the litesql::Database in use
rCurrentActivity a reference to the Activity expeteced to be set as finished
rTTS a reference to the Todo Today Sheet to be inquired

int pomotuxdatabase::TodoTodaySheet::GetMaxmActivityOrder ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
TodoTodaySheet &  rTTS 
) [virtual]

Fecthes the Todo Today Sheet looking for the Activity with maximum mOrder (i.e. scheduled as last) and return the mOrder as an Integer

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the litesql::Database in use
rTTS a reference to the Todo Today Sheet to be inquired
Returns:
an Integer representing the Maximum Activity Order

void pomotuxdatabase::TodoTodaySheet::MakeConsistent ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
TodoTodaySheet &  rTTS 
) [virtual]

Grants the consistency of the Todo Today Sheet by checking the order of Activities and removing the possibile gaps that can appear during execution

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the litesql::Database in use
rTTS a reference to the Todo Today Sheet to be made consistent

void pomotuxdatabase::TodoTodaySheet::MoveActivity ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
Activity &  rCurrentActivity,
TodoTodaySheet &  rCurrentTDS,
const int  direction 
) [virtual]

Moves an Activity one position upward or downward in the Todo Today Sheet, the Direction is passed as an Integer (+1 to go downward, -1 to go upward)

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the litesql::Database in use
rCurrentActivity a reference to the Activity expeteced to be moved
rTTS a reference to the Todo Today Sheet to be inquired
direction the movement direction expressed as an Integer (+1 downward shift,-1 upward shift)

void pomotuxdatabase::TodoTodaySheet::PostponeActivity ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
Activity &  rCurrentActivity,
TodoTodaySheet &  rTTS 
) [virtual]

Forces an Activity to be thrown out of the Todo Today Sheet whether finished or not

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the litesql::Database in use
rCurrentActivity a reference to the Activity to be postponed
rTTS a reference to the Todo Today Sheet to be inquired

void pomotuxdatabase::TodoTodaySheet::ScheduleActivity ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
Activity &  rNewActivity,
ActivityInventorySheet &  rAIS,
TodoTodaySheet &  rTTS 
) [virtual]

Inserts an Activity already present in the Activity Inventory Sheet in the Todo Today Sheet ordered as last (i.e. FIFO-like behavior last activity inserted is scheduled with the smaller grade of priority)

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the litesql::Database in use
rNewActivity a reference to the Activity that needs to be scheduled
rAIS a reference to the Activity Inventory Sheet containig the Activity
rTTS a reference to the Todo Today Sheet in which the Activity is expected to be inserted
